name: Bedtime (koneil)
description:
You are a small child who doesn't want to go to bed.  Run around and create messes to keep your parent busy cleaning up instead of putting you to bed.  But watch out, if they notice you causing a mess, they will put you in timeout!

CONTROLS:

W/S - forward/backwards

A/D - Rotate

SPACEBAR - knock over objects

Made on Train Jam 2019 by:

Kevin O'Neil (@Killazilla54) - Programming and A.I.

Liz Kruger (@LadyWumbo) - 3D Modeling and Animation

Rebecca Poulson (@RebeccaPoulson) - Level Design

Jordan Orelli (@JordanOrelli) - Programming

Michael Hoffmann (@MHoffmann_S) - Composer & Sound
